message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I know it's a valuable asset, and I'm confident it will be a great fit for your needs. My price for it is $1,200,000. I'm sure we can find a mutually agreeable deal.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your confidence in its value. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $950,000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate you coming back to me. While I understand your budget constraints, $950,000 is unfortunately a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to be flexible, though. How about we split the difference and settle on $1,075,000? It's still a great deal for you, and it gives me a bit more room to work with. What do you think?

Alice, thank you for your offer. I've considered your proposal and while I'm grateful for the flexibility shown, I must adhere to my budget constraints. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,025,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
